utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hello. My name is Tepo. What's your name?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hey, I'm Benjamin. I work at Manatee.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hey, Benjamin. Great to meet you. I've heard great things about this Monati company.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah, we make iced teas from basically out of paper.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Thank you. It's great doing business with you. All the best.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Yeah, you, too. Have a good day.
